summary: This is an email from an unidentified sender to Jay Lefkowitz, transmitting an executed addendum document related to Epstein and requesting the original signature pages be sent via FedEx. It appears to be legal or contractual correspondence.

persons.name: Jay Lefkowitz
persons.context: Addressed in an email regarding an executed addendum related to Epstein, with instructions to FedEx original signature pages.

events.title: Email transmitting executed Epstein addendum
events.description: An email was sent to Jay Lefkowitz containing an executed version of an addendum related to Epstein, with a request to FedEx the original signature pages.

keyFacts: An executed addendum related to Jeffrey Epstein was transmitted via email on October 30, 2007.
Jay Lefkowitz was instructed to FedEx the original signature pages of the addendum.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal or contractual matters involving Epstein in late 2007.
